Package io.github.thecsdev.betterstats.api.util.io

Class StatsProviderIO

java.lang.Object
io.github.thecsdev.betterstats.api.util.io.StatsProviderIO
public final class StatsProviderIO extends Object
A utility class for reading and writing IStatsProvider data.

  • Method Details

    • write

      public static final void write(net.minecraft.network.PacketByteBuf buffer, IStatsProvider statsProvider) throws NullPointerException
      Writes an IStatsProvider's statistics data to a given PacketByteBuf.
      Parameters:
      buffer - The buffer to write the data to.
      statsProvider - The data to write.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException

    • read

      public static final void read(net.minecraft.network.PacketByteBuf buffer, IEditableStatsProvider statsProvider) throws IllegalHeaderException, io.github.thecsdev.tcdcommons.api.util.exceptions.UnsupportedFileVersionException
      Reads an IStatsProvider's data that has been written to a PacketByteBuf, and converts it to an IStatsProvider.
      Parameters:
      buffer - The buffer to read data from.
      statsProvider - The IEditableStatsProvider to load the data into.
      Throws:
      IllegalHeaderException - If the "RIFF" header is missing, or the file extension is invalid.
      io.github.thecsdev.tcdcommons.api.util.exceptions.UnsupportedFileVersionException - If the file data version is not supported.

    • writeGameProfile

      public static final void writeGameProfile(net.minecraft.network.PacketByteBuf buffer, @Nullable @Nullable com.mojang.authlib.GameProfile gameProfile)
      Writes a GameProfile to a given PacketByteBuf.

    • readGameProfile

      @Nullable public static final @Nullable com.mojang.authlib.GameProfile readGameProfile(net.minecraft.network.PacketByteBuf buffer)
      Reads a GameProfile from a PacketByteBuf. Will return null if a "null" GameProfile was written to the buffer.

    • saveToFile

      public static void saveToFile(File file, IStatsProvider statsProvider) throws IOException
      Saves an IStatsProvider's data to a File.
      If the File doesn't exist, it will be created; otherwise, it will be overridden.
      Parameters:
      file - The File to save the IStatsProvider to.
      statsProvider - The IStatsProvider to save.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the File IO operations raise an IOException.

    • loadFromFile

      public static IEditableStatsProvider loadFromFile(File file) throws FileNotFoundException, IOException
      Loads an IStatsProvider's data from a File.
      Parameters:
      file - The File to load the IStatsProvider from.
      Returns:
      The loaded IStatsProvider.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - If the File does not exist.
      IOException - If File IO operations raise an IOException.
